title: James A Garfield National Historic Site: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 2 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      James A Garfield National Historic Site Behind the Scenes       Location: starts in Visitor Center  Fees: $15/person     Saturday, September 3, 2016 Every 1st Saturday of every month. from 04/04/2015 to 08/01/2020 A special look at places in the Garfield home not available to the general public. View Details      James A Garfield National Historic Site Behind the Ropes      Time: 10:00 AM to 11:30 AM Location: James A. Garfield National Historic Site Fees: $15     Saturday, September 10, 2016 Every 2nd Saturday of every month. from 04/11/2015 to 07/11/2020 Go behind the velvet ropes for an up-close look at some of the site's most interesting artifacts.
